author: Winston Churchill
message: Before you can inspire with emotion, you must be swamped with it yourself. Before you can move their tears, your own must flow. To convince them, you must yourself believe.
title: Thought of the day

author: William James
message: The greatest discovery of our generation is that human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind. As you think, so shall you be.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry David Thoreau
message: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dream, and endeavours to live the life which he had imagines, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
title: Thought of the day

author: Pearl Buck
message: The secret of joy in work is contained in one word excellence. To know how to do something well is to enjoy it.
title: Thought of the day
